projects.name: Small business site - a mouthful guide
projects.description: Your go-to guide for my favorite recipes and restaurants! This app is fully responsive, ensuring a great experience on any screen size. Navigate easily, explore recommendations in a clean layout, and interact with features like a detailed form and a mobile menu.

projects.name: Accessibility Quiz
projects.description: An interactive accessibility quiz. It’s designed to be as accessible as possible for all users and to serve as a learning tool. We’ve included semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, ARIA roles, and good color contrast to support screen readers and other assistive tech.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Stay ahead of the weather with this app built in TypeScript. Fetching data from a weather API, it provides current conditions (temperature, description) and a 4-day forecast. Search for cities or use your current location for instant weather information.

projects.name: A Recipe App
projects.description: Fetching real-time data from Spoonacular, you can explore a wide variety of dishes. Filter and sort recipes to perfectly match your preferences, or get inspired by a random selection. Includes step-by-step instructions and a responsive design for all devices.
